de.esoco.lib.comm

Class GraylogMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
      • de.esoco.lib.comm.GraylogMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.obrel.core.Relatable

    public class GraylogMessage
extends org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
    A data object that holds the informations for a Graylog message in the Graylog extended log format (GELF).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GraylogMessage.Level
      Enumeration of the RFC 5424 severity levels used by graylog.

    • Field Summary

      static org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> _FILE_NAME
      Optional field: the name of the file in which the logging occurred.

      Optional field: the line number of the file in which the logging occurred.
      static org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> _ORIGIN
      Optional field: a description of the origin that caused the generation of the log message.
      static org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> FULL_MESSAGE
      The full log message.
      static org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> HOST
      The host sending the message.
      static org.obrel.core.RelationType<GraylogMessage.Level> LEVEL
      The severity level.
      static org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> SHORT_MESSAGE
      The short log message.
      static org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.Long> TIMESTAMP
      The log timestamp in milliseconds.
      static org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> VERSION
      The message format version.

      • _ORIGIN

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> _ORIGIN
        Optional field: a description of the origin that caused the generation of the log message. This is typically something like a person, process, or system.
